mapper.select: select id as "id", name as "name", sex as "sex" from pw_userinfo

select r.role_code as "roleCode", r.role_name as "roleName" from pw_userinfo u LEFT JOIN pw_userinfo_roleinfo_rel sru on u.id= sru.user_id LEFT JOIN pw_roleinfo r on sru.role_id=r.role_id where login_id=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id as "fileId", file_name as "fileName", file_path as "filePath", file_type as "fileType", file as "uploadFile", update_date as "lastModifyDate" from pw_file_info
SELECT CAST(COUNT(1) AS CHAR) FROM pw_userinfo WHERE login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select password from pw_userinfo where login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.ACTIVITY_ID as "activityId", t.ACTIVITY_NAME as"activityName", t.ACTIVITY_DESC as "activityDesc", t.CREATE_NAME as "createName", t.TELEPHONE as "telephone", t.CREATEDATE as "createDate", t.STARTDATE as "startDate", t.ENDDATE as "endDate", t.ORGLEVER as "orgLevel", t.ORGRANGE as "orgRange" FROM clyx_activity t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_TALK(USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, USER_TALKDESC) VALUES( #{userName}, #{createTime}, #{userTalkDesc})
